scenario_text.value:
I went to search the forest. Deep within, I
found that a new building had appeared.

What kind of building? And did you run into
anyone? Were there people inside?!

Please calm yourself, Takuma. One question
at a time.
The building appeared to be...a library.

I only did a cursory scouting of the entrance,
so I don’t know if there was anyone inside.

What’s more, the building was clearly
distinct from those we’ve seen up to now.

I suppose it would be faster to have everyone
hear this. Shall we return to the school?

Uh... Yeah, of course. Okay,
back to the school, then.
